TMDA Configuration Overview

  1. First read the Pre-Configuration section for changes you might need to make to non-TMDA software such as your SMTP-server.

  2. Next read the Server Configuration section for how to filter incoming messages on your mailserver with TMDA.

  3. If you want to tag outgoing messages from your mail or news client, then read the Client Configuration section.

  4. If you want to customize your TMDA installation, read the Configuration Variables reference. This is also highly recommended reading if you want to get a better sense of TMDA's capabilities and features.

  5. If you are upgrading from an earlier release of TMDA, make sure to consult the UPGRADE file that came with your TMDA distribution.

  6. Finally, consider joining one or more of the mailing lists to stay current with TMDA.
